DOC.brief_summary: The study was designed to obtain some baseline data on COPD in Malatya region of Turkey.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of COPD: First Epidemiological Data From a Large Region of Turkey
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty clusters from urban and rural regions were randomly selected. Ten and seven consecutive houses were included in the study from each urban and rural cluster respectively. A validated questionnaire on epidemiology of COPD was completed for each household over 18 by a pulmonary physician. Each subject performed the standard spirometric measurement and early bronchodilation testing.
DOC.criteria: All households over 18 were included in the study Age <18 years
